name: Boss Battle Build Bout - The Party's Last Adventure
name_original: Boss Battle Build Bout - The Party's Last Adventure
description:
Okay, Thank the gods I managed to finish this in time.

This little project was made for the Boss Battle Build Bout event from the official RPG Maker Forums: https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/boss-battle-build-bout-sep-13th...

This is my first time participating, so I wanted to make a good first impression! However, I underestimated the timeframe greatly and had to rush at the last minutes.

Due to me starting playtesting and polishing relatively late, there may be bugs still present in the game, but hopefully nothing gamebreaking.

Also a Disclaimer: I offer 3 different modes for battle length and I urge any Judge that intends to strictly follow the 10 minute rule to play the "Shortened" mode. Though to be fair, I put a tremendous amount of effort into my submission and I think the "Standard" experience will be worth your time!

Other than that, please have fun with my interpretation of the boss.

And good luck to all other participants!
